ing: 2/3 cup KRAFT Mayo with Olive Oil & Cracked Pepper Reduced Fat Mayonnaise
1 1/2 cups KRAFT Shredded Three Cheese with a Touch of PHILADELPHIA
des: "Ham and cheese--a classic pairing--make a delicious, hot and creamy casserole that's on the table in under an hour."
ins:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Combine ingredients.
Spoon into 2-qt. casserole.
Bake 35 min. or until heated through.
